Text:
Hey, thanks.  It's nice to see girls who aren't all pierced up, tatoo'd, or otherwise mutilated.  AND they are WOMEN.  They have breasts and curves!  No kids!  Thanks again.

And I'm going to rant for a second.  A few years ago I used to think tattoos on girls were pretty hot as long as they weren't really girly ones like dolphins and shit.  But only certain girls can pull that look off.  The rest just need to refrain, you know?  Even "teen" porno these days is filled up with girls who've spent more time in tatoo parlors than the gym.  It's nasty and slutty.  And the navel piercing?  Well, you'd think they were born with them now.  Everybody wants to be like everyone else.

So, yeah, there were a few girls like that in this torrent but not many.  Thanks again, A.
And I should say that a lot of the photography is actually very solid, too.  We need more torrents like THIS.
